about:
My name is Clément, I'm 23 years old. 
 I live in Bordeaux and I am Software Developper. 
 I chose the OpenClassrooms, which specialises in the field of computer development in order to continue my studies in a sandwich course. 
 Not having been convinced by the work-study formats and the and the programme of the schools in my region, I want to continue in a framework offering more autonomy in order to obtain a RNCP level 6 qualification

tasks.value: - Creation of modules for our ERP in PHP
- Creation of software in WD Language following a specification
- Component improvement for our CRM in WD Language
- Addition of PHP functions to meet customer needs
- Installation and configuration of security systems (video surveillance, alarms, security gates)
- Biomedical service, diagnosis and repair of electronic equipment.
- Stock management and disinfection of materials
- Design of drawings and wiring of a pump station of a pumping station

interests:
- New technologies 
 - Programming 
 - Electronics 
 - Computer science 
 - Sports (football, rugby, bodybuilding...) 
 - Travel (London, Florida, Croatia ...) 
 - Photography 
 - Car/Motorcycle
